scholarship_description: A fully-funded master's degree scholarship offered by the Swedish government to students from eligible countries. Focuses on leadership development and networking alongside academic studies.
stipend_coverage: Full tuition coverage, monthly stipend (10,000 SEK), travel grant, insurance, and one-time settling-in allowance.

scholarship_description: The UK government's global scholarship programme that offers future leaders, influencers, and decision-makers a one-year funded master's degree in the UK.
stipend_coverage: Full tuition fees, monthly living allowance, travel costs, arrival and departure allowances, and additional grants.

scholarship_name: Erasmus Mundus Joint Master Degree Scholarships (EMJMD)
university_world_rank: Varies by programme (Consortium of European universities)
location: Multiple European countries (e.g., Germany, France, Italy)
scholarship_description: A prestigious EU-funded scholarship for high-quality joint master's programmes. Students study in at least two different European countries.
stipend_coverage: Tuition fees, travel and installation costs, monthly allowance (~1000 EUR/month), and full insurance coverage.

scholarship_description: Fully-funded scholarships offered by the Australian government as part of its development assistance programme, targeting future leaders from partner countries like Bangladesh.
stipend_coverage: Full tuition fees, return airfare, establishment allowance, living expenses stipend, health insurance, and textbook/study materials allowance.

scholarship_description: Scholarships offered by the German Academic Exchange Service (DAAD) to support international students pursuing master's or doctoral degrees at German universities, promoting excellence in research and study.
stipend_coverage: Monthly stipend (~861-1200 EUR), travel allowance, health insurance, and possibly family allowance and study/research grants.
